title: Man City 'preparing £100m bid for Lionel Messi' and more transfer rumours
text:
Man City 'preparing £100m bid for Lionel Messi' and more transfer rumours Manchester City transfer news includes reports of summer move for Barcelona star Lionel Messi. Manchester City have reportedly made Barcelona star Lionel Messi their top summer transfer target. 
According to The Mirror , there is a belief at the Etihad Stadium that Messi is ready to leave the club he has represented throughout his career and they are confident a £100m deal could see the Argentine wearing City blue next season. 
And bumper new contracts for Neymar and Luis Suarez will leave Barcelona struggling to give Messi an increase on his current deal. 
Messi is believed to be keen to play for Pep Guardiola again, and with the Catalan committed to City it could lead to a reunion in Manchester. 
Meanwhile, with Claudio Bravo 's future under the microscope, City are being linked with Sunderland goalkeeper Jordan Pickford . 
He signed a new contract with the Black Cats earlier this season, but is believed to be ready to leave should David Moyes' side be relegated from the Premier League. 
The Express reports that City are interested in taking the young stopper, who would boost their home-grown quota, with both Joe Hart and Willy Caballero set to move on in the summer. Read More Man City midfielder Fernando reacts to draw vs Huddersfield in FA Cup 
But they are set to face serious competition from Everton. 
City continue to be linked with the majority of Monaco's squad, with Benjamin Mendy the latest name to be added to the list. 
According to ESPN , left back is high on Guardiola's list of transfer priorities and they are keeping close tabs on Mendy.
